compounddef.title: RF24HUB A Network of Sensors communicating over an 2.4GHZ Network.

detaileddescription.para:
Components:
ATMEL/Arduino based Nodes
Gateway based on ESP8266/ESP32 or Raspberry PI (ervery Linux System with useable GPIO Pins can be used)
Hub as the cental Component based on any Linux System
Further Details:
Quick Install Guide and System Overview
Configure and Build a Arduino-Node from the Template
Configure and Build a ESP-Node from the Template
